example.text: Biden's border crisis is out of control. His decision to end President Trump's Title 42 policy is about to make things even worse. I will be voting today for the Secure the Border Act to require Biden to finish the wall, hire more Border Patrol agents, and end catch and release. [[url]]
I appreciate Senator Tester and Senator Moran for their work introducing this important bill. I also thank Representative Chavez- DeRemer for introducing a similar bill in the House.

Southern Illinois is home to over 55,000 veterans; and as a Marine myself, I don't take my responsibility to them lightly. That's why I've championed the VIPER Act to encourage VA's innovative medical and prosthetic research programs; the Improving Access to the VA Home Loan Benefit Act to streamline the home buying process for veterans; and the STRONG Veterans Act to ensure veterans can get mental health services during their time of need.

In upstate NY, 20 homeless veterans were booted from the hotel they were staying at until they had permanent housing so migrants who crossed the border had a place to stay. It is infuriating that Democrat politicians choose non-citizen migrants over homeless American veterans. [[url]]

Biden's border crisis is out of control. His decision to end President Trump's Title 42 policy is about to make things even worse. I will be voting today for the Secure the Border Act to require Biden to finish the wall, hire more Border Patrol agents, and end catch and release. [[url]]

Blocking the Sale of Our Energy Reserves to China On Thursday, I voted for the Protecting America's Strategic Petroleum Reserve from China Act. This important bill would block the Biden administration from selling off our emergency petroleum reserves to anyone affiliated with the Chinese Communist Party.

Biden's border crisis is out of control. His decision to end President Trump's Title 42 policy is about to make things even worse. I will be voting today for the Secure the Border Act to require Biden to finish the wall, hire more Border Patrol agents, and end catch and release. [[url]]
